name: KellyReader
0:
”Alexa, open Kelly Reader”
”Open Kelly Reader and read a poem”
”Ask Kelly Reader to read me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kelly reader
des: Get serenaded with a series of humorous and relatable haikus played by Kelly Reader. Each haiku is inspired by real life events and play around with the concept of family, upbringing, and culture.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
